body: Hi Daniel, You can use Daysim for that and get the hourly radiation values for each hour of the year similar to annual daylight simulation. [Here](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/hobeybee-hourly-solar-radiation?commentId=2985220%3AComment%3A1261126&groupId=2985220%3AGroup%3A658987) is similar question.
